Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Interface LeaderCard

All Superinterfaces:
Convertible
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChangeResource, Discount, ExtraDeposit, ExtraProd
public interface LeaderCard
extends Convertible
The interface implemented by all the leader cards. A leader card gives the Player new abilities he can use during a Game

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void assignTo​(Player p)
    Assign the LeaderCard to a Player.
    boolean canBePlayed()
    Used to check if the Player has the requirements for playing a LeaderCard that he already owns.
    boolean equals​(LeaderCard compare)
    Compare two LeaderCard.
    java.lang.String getID()
    Gets the LeaderCard's ID.
    Resource getPowerResource()
    Gets a Resource that changes by the type of leaderCard: for ExtraDeposit is the placeable, for ChangeResource is the changeable, for Discount is the discount and for ExtraProd is the required resource for produce.
    boolean isEnable()
    Check if the LeaderCard has been played by the Player or not.
    void playCard()
    Set the LeaderCard to enable, wrap the Player with a new player that correctly implements the new abilities and adding him the right amount of victory points.
    void setPlayer​(Player tmp)
    Sets the Player to this LeaderCard

    Methods inherited from interface it.polimi.ingsw.Convertible

    getClassName

  • Method Details

    • playCard

      void playCard()
      Set the LeaderCard to enable, wrap the Player with a new player that correctly implements the new abilities and adding him the right amount of victory points.

    • canBePlayed

      boolean canBePlayed()
      Used to check if the Player has the requirements for playing a LeaderCard that he already owns.
      Returns:
      true if the Player has the requirements to play the LeaderCard, false otherwise.

    • assignTo

      void assignTo​(Player p)
      Assign the LeaderCard to a Player.
      Parameters:
      p - the Player to whom assign the LeaderCard.

    • isEnable

      boolean isEnable()
      Check if the LeaderCard has been played by the Player or not.
      Returns:
      true if the LeaderCard has been played.

    • equals

      boolean equals​(LeaderCard compare)
      Compare two LeaderCard.
      Parameters:
      compare - the leader to compare.
      Returns:
      true if the leadercard match, false otherwise.

    • getID

      java.lang.String getID()
      Gets the LeaderCard's ID.
      Returns:
      the LeaderCard's ID.

    • setPlayer

      void setPlayer​(Player tmp)
      Sets the Player to this LeaderCard
      Parameters:
      tmp - the Player who has to be setted the card

    • getPowerResource

      Resource getPowerResource()
      Gets a Resource that changes by the type of leaderCard: for ExtraDeposit is the placeable, for ChangeResource is the changeable, for Discount is the discount and for ExtraProd is the required resource for produce.
      Returns:
      the Resource.
